description: International Food Services is an independently owned Maritime Catering Organisation. We offer Catering solutions of the, highest quality and monitor the consumption on board and deliveries for our clients in the shipping industry., IFS has offices in Antwerp, Poland, Singapore and Manila. We stand for a no-nonsense approach with a dedicated team, we, try to make a difference for our clients. Passion for the job and a sustainable collaboration is very important for us., We aim to increase our clients' buying power by reducing waste and inefficiencies. We achieve this by training and support of, the Crew on board and to improve the well-being on board of the crew.,
responsibilities: IFS is growing rapidly, to keep our teams well organized and our clients satisfied, we are looking for a full-time crewing operations assistant who will provide daily support to the IFS crewing department., The main tasks/responsibilities will be:, Keeping the Crewing mailbox organized by filing and prioritizing your own tasks within the mailbox., Daily support on crew change planning and scheduling including documentation checks and communication with the manning agencies., Responsible for the scheduling and travel arrangements of our catering superintendents worldwide., On a weekly basis perform checks in our client system and update the system accordingly., Responsible for monitoring, chasing, and tracking uniforms, appraisals, crew documentation, and registering this accordingly in our records., Support on other project-related tasks on request of the Crewing Coordinator.
experienceRequirements: Minimum Bachelor degree;, Minimum 3-5 years of working experience in a diverse job with office and organizing/multi-tasking experience;, Fluent in English on a professional level;, Affinity or working experience in the shipping industry;, Strong communication and organizing skills;, Reliable, Flexible, proactive work mentality;, No 9-5 mentality;, Stress resistant; confident when working under pressure in a fast-paced environment;, Independent;, Available after working hours for crewing emergencies.
